sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"保护，保卫"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: defend, protect, safeguard, guard, shield, shelter, harbour
means: defend ： 普通用词，指用武力或其它措施使人或物不受损害，消除危险。用作比喻时，指坚持某种行动、决定或意见。
protect ： 普通用词，指用某种手段作为防御工具以防危险或伤害。
safeguard ： 语气强，指采取积极措施预防可能发生的一切攻击或危险。
guard ： 普通用词，指保持警惕以防可能的攻击或伤害。
shield ： 语气比protect强，但侧重防止迫在眉睫的攻击或伤害。
shelter ： 通常指寻找安全地方躲避风雨或使人免遭危害。
harbour ： 贬义词，指隐匿或非法保护、窝藏。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未被发现的, 未被识破的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un没有,未+detect[v.察觉,发觉,侦察,探测]+ed……的→adj.未被发现的, 未被识破的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给予保护的, 保护的
stems_affixes.word_buile: protect保护,保卫+ive表形容词→adj.给予保护的, 保护的
detect[v.察觉,发觉,侦察,探测]+ion表名词→n.察觉,发觉;侦察
detect[v.察觉,发觉,侦察,探测]+ive人→n.侦探
protect[v.[from]保护,保卫]+ion表名词→n.保护,警戒

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保护者,育幼院,儿童教养院
stems_affixes.word_buile: protect[v.[from]保护,保卫]+ory场所→保护少年儿童之地
de去掉+tect盖上,掩护→把盖上的打开
pro在前面+tect盖上,掩护→在前面掩护→保护

entry.def: To protect someone or something means to prevent them from being harmed or damaged.

example.ex: So, what can women do to protect themselves from heart disease?...
example.tran: 那么，女性怎样做才能使自己不得心脏病呢？

example.ex: A long thin wool coat and a purple headscarf protected her against the wind...
example.tran: 一件薄薄的羊毛长外套和一条紫色的头巾为她挡了风。

entry.def: If an insurance policy protects you against an event such as death, injury, fire, or theft, the insurance company will give you or your family money if that event happens.

example.ex: Many manufacturers have policies to protect themselves against blackmailers.
example.tran: 许多厂家都购买了保险，以防遭到敲诈。

means.word_mean: 1. shield from danger, injury, destruction, or damage;

sentences.sentence: "Weatherbeater protects your roof from the rain"

means.word_mean: 2. use tariffs to favor domestic industry

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin protect- 'covered in front', from the verb protegere, from pro- 'in front' + tegere 'to cover'

sentences.cn: 它对于精灵而言尤为神圣, 因此他们加派了额外的兵力保卫它.
sentences.en: It is deeply sacred to the Elves, so they've allocated additional forces to protect it.

sentences.cn: 我们使用它们来保卫我们神圣的土地.
sentences.en: We use them to protect our sacred grounds.

sentences.cn: 当时我洋溢着爱国主义思想,希望保卫祖国.
sentences.en: At that time, I was full of patriotism and wanted to protect the motherland.

sentences.cn: 法律是为保卫人民的权利和财产而制定的.
sentences.en: Laws are constituted to protect individual rights and properties.

sentences.cn: 保卫是他们的任务,数千年来他们善尽职守.
sentences.en: To protect and guard was their mission and for thousands of years they succeeded.

sentences.cn: 林理应保卫而非滥用司法程序.
sentences.en: Lam had the duty to protect, not abuse, the administration of justice.

sentences.cn: 遵守诺言就像保卫你的荣誉一样.

sentences.cn: 佛莱谢说: [总统毫不迟疑地维护以色列保卫自己的权利.
sentences.en: Fleischer said: The President safeguards Israel's rights to protect itself without hesitation.

sentences.cn: " 有的人待在家里是要保卫这个州不受侵略嘛!

sentences.cn: 你是震动的了解很少一点飞行被空军中将保卫 吗 ?
sentences.en: Were you shocked to learn that few flights are protected by air marshals?

sentences.cn: 与保卫联军进攻纵队侧翼的联军单位之一的通讯联系中断.
sentences.en: Communication was lost with one of the coalition units protecting the flanks of the advancing column.

sentences.cn: 这一战略体现我们最为严肃的职责: 保卫美国人民的安全.
sentences.en: This strategy reflects our most solemn obligation: to protect the security of the American people.

sentences.cn: 党又一次号召解放军指战员保卫人民群众的生命财产和人身安全.
sentences.en: And Party once again has to appeal to the armed forces rescue people and protect property.

sentences.cn: 这座城市正在用屏障保卫自己,以防止敌人的攻击.
sentences.en: The city was being fenced with a barrier to protect itself against enemy attacks.

sentences.cn: 游行队伍高喊 ” 保卫厦门, 加入我们! ” 动员市民参与, 人数有所增加.
sentences.en: The procession is shouting:'protect Xiamen! Join us!'mobilizing citizens to join in. Numbers are increasing.

sentences.cn: 现在受打击的各国政府正比着赛似的保卫本国优势产业.
sentences.en: Governments around the world are racing to protect their cherished, if dented, national champions.

sentences.cn: 我们的奥运火炬用不熄灭,誓死保卫火炬,捍卫祖国尊严!

sentences.cn: 我们的领导人将不惜一切代价保卫我们的领土完整.
sentences.en: Our leaders will protect our territories at all costs.

sentences.cn: 居庸关长城建于明朝,用途是保卫当时的首都.
sentences.en: The Juyong Pass was rebuilt in the Ming Dynasty as a reinforcement to protect its capital.

sentences.cn: 对于任何一届政府来说,没有比保卫美国人民的安全更高的任务了.
sentences.en: There is There's no higher task to any administration than protecting the Ameican American people.

sentences.cn: 他们在为保卫祖国而战.
sentences.en: They were fighting to protect their country.

sentences.cn: 我们必须增加富有经验的士兵来保卫力量薄弱的前线.
sentences.en: We shall have to throw out a line of experienced soldiers to protect our weak front.

sentences.cn: 我们必须让哨兵站岗保护我们; 他们站岗保卫的宝石被盗.
sentences.en: We must stand sentinel to protect ourselves; The jewels over which they kept guard were stolen.

sentences.cn: 宪法赋予总统全权来使用武力保卫国家安全。
sentences.en: The Constitution grants the president plenipotentiary powers to use military force to protect our national security.

sentences.cn: 原产地规则已日益成为贸易保护的一种手段.
sentences.en: The rules of origin have become to be a method to protect the national trade.
